title: Image Gallery
body:
# **What it is?**

A Image gallery responsive made with CSS grid and Flexbox. The number of columns expands or contract accordingly with the name of pictures but also with the size of the screen



## What I learned?

* CSS Grid
* Flexbox
* BEM Methodology
* Accessibility
